com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.autodownload

Interface IPlaylistItem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlaylistItem
    public interface IPlaylistItem
    An IPlaylist will contain a collection of IPlaylistItem. Each item represents a single IAsset that is part of the playlist.

      abstract boolean isPending()
      Indicates if this item is pending processing for the next auto download.
      boolean isPending()
      Indicates if this item is pending processing for the next auto download. Once the item is processed and the asset is queued for download then pending is set to false.
      Returns:
      true if this item is currently pending processing for download
